subject: p10274145
History: -year-old man status post right BKA, on antibiotics with fever to 102 degrees. Assess for pneumonia or other acute process.
Findings: The lungs are clear bilaterally with no areas of focal consolidation. There is no pleural effusion or pneumothorax. Patient is status post CABG. Cardiomegaly is stable. Mediastinal silhouette is within normal limits.
Impression: No evidence of pneumonia. Stable cardiomegaly.
